description: This file defines the SearchScreen widget, a StatefulWidget that provides search functionality within a book library app. It includes a text input for user queries, performs searches via the BookService, and displays results using a ListView. The widget allows navigation to a BookDetailsScreen on selecting a book.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages the search interface and results display.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State class managing search query and results, including UI building.

methods.name: _onSearch
methods.description: Handles search input, updates searchQuery, performs search via BookService, and updates the results list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, including search input, results list, and navigation to book details.
